001package com.technototes.path.util;
002
003import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
004
005import java.io.File;
006import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
007import java.io.PrintWriter;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010
011import org.apache.commons.math3.stat.regression.SimpleRegression;
012
013import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.kinematics.Kinematics;
014
015/**
016 * Various regression utilities.
017 */
018public class RegressionUtil {
019
020    /**
021     * Feedforward parameter estimates from the ramp regression and additional summary statistics
022     */
023    public static class RampResult {
024        public final double kV, kStatic, rSquare;
025
026        public RampResult(double kV, double kStatic, double rSquare) {
027            this.kV = kV;
028            this.kStatic = kStatic;
029            this.rSquare = rSquare;
030        }
031    }
032
033    /**
034     * Feedforward parameter estimates from the ramp regression and additional summary statistics
035     */
036    public static class AccelResult {
037        public final double kA, rSquare;
038
039        public AccelResult(double kA, double rSquare) {
040            this.kA = kA;
041            this.rSquare = rSquare;
042        }
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Numerically compute dy/dx from the given x and y values. The returned list is padded to match
047     * the length of the original sequences.
048     *
049     * @param x x-values
050     * @param y y-values
051     * @return derivative values
052     */
053    private static List<Double> numericalDerivative(List<Double> x, List<Double> y) {
054        List<Double> deriv = new ArrayList<>(x.size());
055        for (int i = 1; i < x.size() - 1; i++) {
056            deriv.add((y.get(i + 1) - y.get(i - 1)) / (x.get(i + 1) - x.get(i - 1)));
057        }
058        // copy endpoints to pad output
059        deriv.add(0, deriv.get(0));
060        deriv.add(deriv.get(deriv.size() - 1));
061        return deriv;
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Run regression to compute velocity and static feedforward from ramp test data.
066     *
067     * Here's the general procedure for gathering the requisite data:
068     *   1. Slowly ramp the motor power/voltage and record encoder values along the way.
069     *   2. Run a linear regression on the encoder velocity vs. motor power plot to obtain a slope
070     *      (kV) and an optional intercept (kStatic).
071     *
072     * @param timeSamples time samples
073     * @param positionSamples position samples
074     * @param powerSamples power samples
075     * @param fitStatic fit kStatic
076     * @param file log file
077     */
078    public static RampResult fitRampData(
079            List<Double> timeSamples,
080            List<Double> positionSamples,
081            List<Double> powerSamples,
082            boolean fitStatic,
083            @Nullable File file) {
084        if (file != null) {
085            try (PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(file)) {
086                pw.println("time,position,power");
087                for (int i = 0; i < timeSamples.size(); i++) {
088                    double time = timeSamples.get(i);
089                    double pos = positionSamples.get(i);
090                    double power = powerSamples.get(i);
091                    pw.println(time + "," + pos + "," + power);
092                }
093            } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
094                // ignore
095            }
096        }
097
098        List<Double> velSamples = numericalDerivative(timeSamples, positionSamples);
099
100        SimpleRegression rampReg = new SimpleRegression(fitStatic);
101        for (int i = 0; i < timeSamples.size(); i++) {
102            double vel = velSamples.get(i);
103            double power = powerSamples.get(i);
104
105            rampReg.addData(vel, power);
106        }
107
108        return new RampResult(Math.abs(rampReg.getSlope()), Math.abs(rampReg.getIntercept()), rampReg.getRSquare());
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Run regression to compute acceleration feedforward.
113     *
114     * @param timeSamples time samples
115     * @param positionSamples position samples
116     * @param powerSamples power samples
117     * @param rampResult ramp result
118     * @param file log file
119     */
120    public static AccelResult fitAccelData(
121            List<Double> timeSamples,
122            List<Double> positionSamples,
123            List<Double> powerSamples,
124            RampResult rampResult,
125            @Nullable File file) {
126        if (file != null) {
127            try (PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(file)) {
128                pw.println("time,position,power");
129                for (int i = 0; i < timeSamples.size(); i++) {
130                    double time = timeSamples.get(i);
131                    double pos = positionSamples.get(i);
132                    double power = powerSamples.get(i);
133                    pw.println(time + "," + pos + "," + power);
134                }
135            } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
136                // ignore
137            }
138        }
139
140        List<Double> velSamples = numericalDerivative(timeSamples, positionSamples);
141        List<Double> accelSamples = numericalDerivative(timeSamples, velSamples);
142
143        SimpleRegression accelReg = new SimpleRegression(false);
144        for (int i = 0; i < timeSamples.size(); i++) {
145            double vel = velSamples.get(i);
146            double accel = accelSamples.get(i);
147            double power = powerSamples.get(i);
148
149            double powerFromVel =
150                    Kinematics.calculateMotorFeedforward(vel, 0.0, rampResult.kV, 0.0, rampResult.kStatic);
151            double powerFromAccel = power - powerFromVel;
152
153            accelReg.addData(accel, powerFromAccel);
154        }
155
156        return new AccelResult(Math.abs(accelReg.getSlope()), accelReg.getRSquare());
157    }
158}
